values.ctor:
<init>(out: OutputStream!)
            Creates an output stream filter built on top of the specified underlying output stream.

values.desc: Closes this output stream and releases any system resources associated with the stream.
Flushes this output stream and forces any buffered output bytes to be written out to the stream.
Writes the specified byte to this output stream.
Writes b.length bytes to this output stream.

values.code: write(b: ByteArray!, off: Int, len: Int)
values.desc: Writes len bytes from the specified byte array starting at offset off to this output stream.
